definitions.text: a mercantile establishment for the retail sale of goods or services
examples: he bought it at a shop on Cape Cod

definitions.text: small workplace where handcrafts or manufacturing are done
a course of instruction in a trade (as carpentry or electricity)
examples: I built a birdhouse in shop

definitions.text: do one's shopping at; do business with; be a customer or client of

examples: I don't need help, I'm just browsing
He told on his classmate who had cheated on the exam
